channel.title: Apax
channel.description:
[CENTER][B]No Banner[/B]
I'am working on this as a side project along with Armadyl but will not be focusing to much on that because of Ranno's inactivity.
[QUOTE]Hello and welcome to the project thread for NoName which will be a server which focuses mainly on pking but will not just be a pvp server but will also be a server where you can do other things besides just pking such as Skilling or fighting monsters and also coming together with other players in many minigames. NoName will not be focusing on adding any new items/animations/graphics/npc's atleast not until they are requested by the community. NoName will try to bring back the enjoyment you had back on many of the old servers like Oblivion-Pk/Soulsplit 1/DeltaScape/etc..[/QUOTE]
Developer(s) Jamal - Roone/RooneyScape/Armadyl-Rs
[B]Media[/B]
[img]http://puu.sh/5dPb5.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/5dPzC.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/5etPb.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/5euir.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/5euka.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/5eup8.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/5hETA.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/5jGf9.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/5jGhm.png[/img] [/CENTER]
Update Log
[code] [09-11-2013] - Base source & client downloaded [09-11-2013] - Cleaned the base removed many un-needed and extra content [09-11-2013] - Working on clanchat [10-11-2013] - Elo Ranking System [10-11-2013] - Music System added [10-11-2013] - World clipping added [10-11-2013] - Loading 525 items/chars/npcs/anims/gfx/maps [10-11-2013] - Have to convert the whole server into an eco friendly server [10-11-2013] - 525 Chatheads added [10-11-2013] - Bank Pin system added [10-11-2013] - Pottery Oven added [10-11-2013] - Amulet/Ring/Necklace moulding has been added [10-11-2013] - Combat has been vastly updated [10-11-2013] - Loading correct mapdata for Tzhaar [10-11-2013] - Gmaul on Npc now works 100% [10-11-2013] - Corporeal beast has been added [10-11-2013] - Server name has been changed to Apax [10-11-2013] - Much better training dungeon added [10-13-2013] - Wilderness updates added look below 1. The welcome interface will not be displayed inside the wilderness when you login. 2. If you disconnect whilst in the wilderness protect item will automatically be activated unless you have been smited. 3. Runescape pvp world login gfx has been added. [10-13-2013] - Yanille is now the home area [10-15-2013] - Sacred Clay armory added [10-15-2013] - You can transform any sacred clay weaponry into a Bow/Staff/Sword [10-15-2013] - Sacred Clay will be available once finishing a certain quest which will be announced soon! [10-15-2013] - Sacred Clay Minions will drop Clay weapons and armours once the quest has been completed [10-15-2013] - If you transform a clay weapon you will not get the option to transform into that weapon [/code]

item.title: Apax
item.dc:creator: @rooneyscape rooneyscape
item.description:
@rooneyscape wrote:

A few Wilderness related updates have been added!

  1. The welcome interface will not be displayed inside the wilderness when you login.

  2. If you disconnect whilst in the wilderness protect item will automatically be activated unless you have been smited.

  3. Runescape pvp world login gfx has been added.

[10-15-2013] - Sacred Clay armory added [10-15-2013] - You can transform any sacred clay weaponry into a Bow/Staff/Sword [10-15-2013] - Sacred Clay will be available once finishing a certain quest which will be announced soon! [10-15-2013] - Sacred Clay Minions will drop Clay weapons and armours once the quest has been completed [10-15-2013] - If you transform a clay weapon you will not get the option to transform into that weapon

Read full topic

item.title: Apax

item.description:
@rooneyscape wrote:

[CENTER][B]No Banner[/B]

I’am working on this as a side project along with Armadyl but will not be focusing to much on that because of Ranno’s inactivity.

[QUOTE]Hello and welcome to the project thread for NoName which will be a server which focuses mainly on pking but will not just be a pvp server but will also be a server where you can do other things besides just pking such as Skilling or fighting monsters and also coming together with other players in many minigames.
NoName will not be focusing on adding any new items/animations/graphics/npc’s atleast not until they are requested by the community. NoName will try to bring back the enjoyment you had back on many of the old servers like Oblivion-Pk/Soulsplit 1/DeltaScape/etc…[/QUOTE]

Developer(s)
Jamal - Roone/RooneyScape/Armadyl-Rs

[B]Media[/B]


[/CENTER]

Update Log

[09-11-2013] - Base source & client downloaded
[09-11-2013] - Cleaned the base removed many un-needed and extra content
[09-11-2013] - Working on clanchat
[10-11-2013] - Elo Ranking System
[10-11-2013] - Music System added
[10-11-2013] - World clipping added
[10-11-2013] - Loading 525 items/chars/npcs/anims/gfx/maps

[10-11-2013] - 525 Chatheads added
[10-11-2013] - Bank Pin system added
[10-11-2013] - Pottery Oven added
[10-11-2013] - Amulet/Ring/Necklace moulding has been added
[10-11-2013] - Combat has been vastly updated

[10-11-2013] - Gmaul on Npc now works 100%
[10-11-2013] - Corporeal beast has been added
[10-11-2013] - Server name has been changed to Apax
[10-11-2013] - Much better training dungeon added
[10-13-2013] - Wilderness updates added look below
1. The welcome interface will not be displayed inside the wilderness when you login.
2. If you disconnect whilst in the wilderness protect item will automatically be activated unless you have been smited.
3. Runescape pvp world login gfx has been added.
[10-13-2013] - Yanille is now the home area
[10-15-2013] - Sacred Clay armory added
[10-15-2013] - You can transform any sacred clay weaponry into a Bow/Staff/Sword
[10-15-2013] - Sacred Clay will be available once finishing a certain quest which will be announced soon!
[10-15-2013] - Sacred Clay Minions will drop Clay weapons and armours once the quest has been completed
[10-15-2013] - If you transform a clay weapon you will not get the option to transform into that weapon
